C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
/bin/sh <<'EOF'
echo "Executing DB waits..."
echo "Testing Database availability on [CNPG RW]"
until
  echo "Testing database on url: [release-name-firezone-cnpg-main-rw]"
  pg_isready -U firezone -d firezone -h release-name-firezone-cnpg-main-rw
  do sleep 5
done
echo "Database available on url: [release-name-firezone-cnpg-main-rw]"
echo "Done executing DB waits..."
EOF
initContainers.name: release-name-firezone-system-cnpg-wait
